ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: The Day of Decision is a fixed appointment:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Surely a time is fixed for the Day of Judgement.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Surely the Day of Judgement has an appointed time;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: The Day of Judgment will certainly be the final appointment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Indeed the Day of Decision is a time fixed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Verily, the Day of Decision is a fixed time,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Surely the day of decision is (a day) appointed:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Surely the Day of Decision is an appointed time,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lo! the Day of Decision is a fixed time,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Surely, the Day of Judgement has an appointed time.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily the Day of Decision is a time appointed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Indeed the Day of Judgement is the tryst,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Verily the Day of Sorting out is a thing appointed,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Verily, the Day of Decision is a fixed time,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Indeed, the Day of Decision is an appointed time,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: The Day of Sorting has been appointed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed, the Day of Judgement is an appointed time -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [78:17] Verily the Day of Decision, for creatures, is the tryst, a time [fixed] for reward and punishment,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Lo! the Day of Decision is a fixed time) it is the appointed time when the people of old and later generations will be gathered,
